name: MoonTwinkies Moon Madness
description:
**Available for PC and Android**

Welcome to the StellarSKULL presents...

MoonTwinkies : Moon Madness!

The stylishly simple classic arcade 1bit video game. Based on the Stellar Network Token, and NFT craze; MoonTwinkies! The first video game of its kind that may be purchased for $1 worth of MoonTwinkies tokens or XLM! *

Game description: While mining the Moon for creme filling, the MoonTwinkies were attacked by Aliens! Try to avoid being devoured  by the ravenous creatures while you gather ammo, powerups, and carcass clearing grenades!  Pick up fuelcells and drop 'em off at the refueling station, then quickly return to the launchpad so that you may escape the... Moon Madness!

*To pay for the MoonTwinkies, please send $1 worth of MoonTwinkies or XLM to;

MoonTwinkies*Lobstr.co  or  MoonTwinkies*Stellarport.io

To learn more about tokens on the Stellar Network, please visit us at StellarSKULL.com.

(If you do not yet have MoonTwinkies or XLM, please download it for free and pay for it by Tweeting about it and sharing the news, deal?)
